title: How constituted
context: PART I. SUPREME COURT Cross References Uniform electronic legal material act, see chapter 98. Rules of Court See generally Supreme Court Rules; Hawaii Rules of Appellate Procedure; Hawaii Court Records Rules; Hawaii Electronic Filing and Service Rules. Law Journals and Reviews Judicial Review and Sexual Freedom. 30 UH L. Rev. 1 (2007). §602-1 How constituted. The supreme court, pursuant to section 2 of article VI of the Constitution, shall consist of a chief justice and four associate justices. [L 1892, c 57, §49; am L 1903, c 32, §13; RL 1925, §2221; RL 1935, §3590; RL 1945, §9601; RL 1955, §214-1; am L Sp 1959 1st, c 5, §2(a); HRS §602-1; ree L 1979, c 111, pt of §2] Cross References Retirement allowance, see §88-74. Tenure, removal, retirement, see Const. art. VI, §§3, 5. Case Notes Provision of will of filling of vacancies among the trustees by choice of majority of the justices, how interpreted. 23 H. 575 (1917), aff&rsquo;d 250 F. 145 (1980).
